ygData.subject: Re: Rune of Banding
ygData.msgSnippet: What are all the ways possible which we can raise our old euridan language skill?  I put 3 points into it and have had a friend speak it to me and it has
ygData.messageBody:
What are all the ways possible which we can raise our old euridan language
skill? I put 3 points into it and have had a friend speak it to me and it
has raised about 10 times. Can I raise it just by speaking it?

Ziffnab (High Elf Wizard)

16th Level

-----Original Message-----
From: John Penman [mailto:jpenman@...]
Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 11:06 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Rune of Banding


From: "John Penman" <jpenman@...>

Runes are used in later lvls for Research of new spells. Some highger 16th
and above lvl spells can only be created (not bought) by combining rune to
make the spell. I have finally gotten my Old Erudin to Excellent and can
read the books offered by our guilds. These books tell you what Runes amke
which spells, so if you found one Keep it safe until you reach uppers lvls.

BTW, where were you hunting that you found the Rune of Banding?

Shadair
15th Lvl Wizzard
Karana

> Yesterday I was huhnting and i got this thing called rune of banding and
went
> to the shop keeper and he was willing to buy it for 1pp 9gp 8sp 6cp and I
was
> just wondering what it did.
>
